title: Request-Response.Correlate.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Request-Response.Correlate capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the subject or agent profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

requestId.description: Identifier of the request to correlate.

responseId.description: Identifier of the response to correlate.

topic.description: Topic or channel where the request/response occurred.
